issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

comment.body:
> Everything apart from the actual video is blocked on YouTube - even the title, channel name, share buttons and comments.

I can't reproduce with your settings on Windows.

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce it, but it can be caused by DNS filtering, so I have added additional rule which should fixes it.
Also I have uncommented another rule (which was disabled in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194690), because now without this rule I cannot download a file (I guess that something has been changed and `Linkvertise` is not used to download files now, so rule started working again).

issue.title: select.mamastar.jp

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: analytics.google.com: breakage
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.0.78.59

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/?authuser=0

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
The google analytics page doesn't load and shows an error `Missing permissions You do not have access to the account or property. Contact an Analytics administrator who has the Manage users permission.`

I’ve determined it is caused by AdGuard Tracking Protection
when that filter list is disabled the page loads as normal

I'm using UBO 1.61.2

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot 2025-01-12 094241](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/11579514-22f3-4f96-bff5-00632dd486b1)
</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
i've temporarly fixed it using this rule

`@@||analytics.google.com^$domain=analytics.google.com`

comment.body:
> кроме DNS сервера, не менял. DNS сервер в AdGuard, AdGuard VPN и в настройках роутера установлен публичный AdGuard с фильтрацией.

А попробуйте в блокировщике выбрать системный DNS, и перезапустите браузер. У меня были проблемы, когда в обоих прогах был выбран кастомный сервер (один и тот же). В целом ВПН в себя роутит все соединения и его достаточно.

> Как включу логирование какие действия мне выполнять? Просто открыть данные сайты или что-то выполнить еще?

Да, повторите проблему и запишите время, когда открывали сайт.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.trustpilot.com/review/aardy.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.trustpilot.com%2Freview%2Faardy.com) ### Comment > 1: please someone else test it. Russia internet and VPN is not practical to reproduce the Pop-up. Scroll down the page on mobile device (or mobile emulator) to get the Pop-up. > 2: I don't get how a clear **Smartphone Ad Banner** should not be filtered in **AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter** on a frequent visited page. Whats the point of this filter? Even the div says `addBannerWrapper`. It literaly screaming _please, filter me_ Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

2.0.78.59

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

Desktop

1. <comment>
The google analytics page doesn't load and shows an error `Missing permissions You do not have access to the account or property. Contact an Analytics administrator who has the Manage users permission.`

when that filter list is disabled the page loads as normal

I'm using UBO 1.61.2

comment.body:
Clean on my iPad, Android and Chrome.
Please try this rule:
`gamesradar.com#@$#.sp-message-open { overflow-y: visible !important; position: static !important; margin-top: 0 !important; }`

If it is visible (scrolling is broken), please try this rule:

`gamesradar.com#$#.sp-message-open { overflow-y: visible !important; position: static !important; }`

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The website display incorrectly, but interactivity is broken. For instance, the homepage display headlines, pictures, etc, but it's impossible to click on headlines and other links. 

A filter prevent dismissing a pop-up. Links are inactive until the user dismiss the popup. 

Using uBlock origin's debug tools, I'm able to blame the following esthetic filter.

Filter: `nytimes.com###complianceOverlay`
Filter type: dom
Filter list: AdGuard Annoyances filter

2. Screenshots: none. The issue is non-visual.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

### Issue URL (Ads) [http://applenews.app](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapplenews.app) ### Comment > All of a sudden, I noticed AdGuard Pro was no longer blocking ads in Apple News. Using uBlock origin's debug tools, I'm able to blame the following esthetic filter.
